translation.en: [girl 1] Ooh. Since when do we have that horse?
-We just got him in. Another rescue. -He's really pretty.
translation.ko: 응, 얼마 전에 데려왔어 - 예쁘다 - 응, 예쁘지

translation.en: [girl 2] Yeah, he's beautiful.
-Let's go see what Shelby's up to. -[girl 1] I'll race ya.
-[horse whinnies] -Apollo. Who's a good boy?
You are. Yes, you are, Apollo. Who's the best boy?
Yes, Apollo.
-I love you, Apollo. -[chuckles] Yes, Apollo.
-What's her horse's name again? -Stop.
Who's the bestest horsey? You are. Yes, you are.
Apollo. I love you, Apollo.
-Apollo, Apollo. -[neighs]
It's a beautiful horse, though.
And Shelby's a pretty good rider.
Well, she'll never be as good as you, Skye.
But she's a lot better than me, of course.
-You're improving all the time, Olivia. -Thanks.
I only had to get on the saddle twice yesterday.
translation.ko: 어제는 안장에 두 번 만에 올랐어

translation.en: Three times. [chuckles]
Hey, Mum. Hey, Grandpa.
-Hey, ladies. -We need your help, Skye. You too, Olivia.
translation.ko: - 엄마, 할아버지 - 얘들아 우리 좀 도와줘

translation.en: -Oh, yay. Someone needs me. -[horse whinnies]
[nervous chuckle] You sure you need me?
-What do we have, Grandpa? -A rescue from a couple counties over.
translation.ko: 할아버지, 누구예요? 다른 지역에서 말을 데려왔어

translation.en: The farm was owned by an elderly couple, the Jenkins.
Mr. Jenkins passed away in the winter,
and his wife just couldn't keep up with the care of the animals.
translation.ko: 할머니 혼자 동물들을 돌볼 수 없었대

translation.en: -This horse has been neglected for months. -[Skye] Is he gonna be okay?
translation.ko: 몇 달 동안 여기저기서 거절당했다더라 이제 괜찮겠죠?

translation.en: I don't think anybody will be riding him anytime soon.
translation.ko: 이 녀석을 타려면 시간이 좀 걸릴 거야

translation.en: He needs a lot of tender loving care, that's for sure.
-What's his name? -Puzzle.
-[Puzzle nickers] -It's okay, Puzzle.
Everything's gonna be okay.
-Careful now. -[Puzzle neighs]
Uh, yeah. Be careful.
-Easy, boy. -[nickers]
Where are you putting that horse?
There's an empty stall right next to Apollo. Right, Billy?
translation.ko: 아폴로 바로 옆에 빈자리가 있지 않아요?

translation.en: What? No. You can't put him there.
Apollo is very sensitive.
-He'll be scared. -[Skye] Relax, Shelby.
translation.ko: - 겁을 먹을 거야 - 셸비, 걱정하지 마

translation.en: Olivia was just teasing you.
We will put Puzzle at the end stall. Apollo won't even know he's there.
translation.ko: 퍼즐한테는 끝자리를 줄게 - 아폴로는 괜찮을 거야 - 그래도 가깝잖아요

translation.en: It's not far enough. Apollo won't be happy.
translation.ko: - 아폴로는 괜찮을 거야 - 그래도 가깝잖아요 무서워할 거예요 아폴로가 걱정돼요

translation.en: And I worry about Apollo, especially when I'm not here.
translation.ko: 무서워할 거예요 아폴로가 걱정돼요 특히 제가 곁에 없을 때요

translation.en: Isn't that right? Don't I worry? Yes, I do worry.
Apollo, Apollo, Apollo.
You sure you're showing enough affection, Shelby?
Very funny, Olivia. You're just jealous.
translation.ko: 하나도 재미없어 내 말이 생기면 서로 얼마나 교감하는지

translation.en: Because you will never experience the powerful emotional connection
translation.ko: 내 말이 생기면 서로 얼마나 교감하는지 너는 하나도 몰라서 그냥 질투하는 거잖아

translation.en: that one forges when one has one's very own horse.
translation.ko: 너는 하나도 몰라서 그냥 질투하는 거잖아

translation.en: -That just sounds weird. -[clicks tongue]
-Olivia, could you grab my bag? -Yes, sir.
[Grandpa] Never a dull moment.
Ethan makes his way down the field with only a goat between him and victory.
translation.ko: 이선 선수가 경기장을 내달립니다 골대 앞에는 염소 한 마리뿐이군요

translation.en: He cuts the corner. He shoots.
And he scores.
Good game, Gary.
Gary, looks like they need some help.
-Oh, hi, Ethan. -Oh, hi.
Wait, what are you doing?
I wanna see if you've got new drawings. I love your drawings.
translation.ko: 오빠 그림이 좋거든 새로 그렸는지 보려고

translation.en: -You do? -Yeah. They're really good.
Oh, thanks.
[gasps] Look at this. Who is this?
-That's Gary, the goat. -[horse whinnying]
-What are you doing? -[clicks]
I'll put Gary on my KidFriend page.
Well, my mum will. She uploads everything.
I don't really do that social media stuff.
translation.ko: 나는 SNS 같은 건 안 해

translation.en: It's a cool way to share all my photos. You should share your drawings.
translation.ko: 다른 사람들한테 사진을 보여 주기 좋아 오빠도 그림을 올려 봐

translation.en: My mum can set up a page for your parents.
translation.ko: 우리 엄마가 웹페이지를 만들어 줄 거야

translation.en: That's a very generous offer, but, no thanks.
I came here to get some animal time. We'll discuss it later.
translation.ko: 오늘은 놀러 왔으니까 나중에 다시 얘기하자

translation.en: I don't need to discuss it.
Hey, Gary.
-[nickers] -There you go. There you go.
His heart rate's elevated, but that's expected.
translation.ko: 심장이 좀 빨리 뛰지만 이 정도는 괜찮아

translation.en: We'll get him cleaned up, take care of the abrasions.
Get him dewormed, get him over to the farrier.
Get some good food into him. That's gonna change a lot.
translation.ko: 맛있는 것도 먹이면 많이 좋아질 거야

translation.en: But is he gonna be okay?
Oh, physically, he's gonna be just fine.
-[Puzzle neighs, snorts] -That's good. [Olivia] Yay.
Well, he's been through a lot.
translation.ko: 그래 이 녀석은 많은 일을 겪었어

translation.en: He hasn't had a lot of human contact.
It'll take a while to get back to normal.
translation.ko: 원래대로 돌아오려면 시간이 좀 걸릴 거야

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll figure it out.
-[Puzzle snorts] -[chuckles] I like that.
-[chuckles] -Figure it out. Just like a real puzzle.
translation.ko: 잘 맞춰 준대요 진짜 퍼즐 같아요

translation.en: [Grandpa] Like I said, it's gonna take some time.
-[nickers] -We'll give him all the time he needs.
[Billy sighs] It's great you're committed
but you can't spend all your free time with Puzzle.
-Why not? I wanna do it. -I know.
But you have to keep up with your schoolwork.
With dyslexia, you have to work extra hard.
I am working extra hard.
Well, apparently, you didn't do so well on your English test today.
translation.ko: 오늘 영어 시험 공부는 열심히 안 한 것 같던데

translation.en: But-- How did you know that?
Aha! I'll bet Shelby told you.
No, no, no. It wasn't Shelby.
Your teacher, Miss Fenton, she called me. And she wants to help.
translation.ko: 펜턴 선생님한테 전화가 왔어 너를 도와주고 싶으시대

translation.en: -I was gonna tell you. -That's okay, honey.
translation.ko: 말씀드리려고 했어요 괜찮아, 우리 딸 그런데 네가 앞에 나가서

translation.en: But Miss Fenton also told me that
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 우리 딸 그런데 네가 앞에 나가서

translation.en: when it came time for you to read in class, you pretended you were sick.
translation.ko: 책을 읽을 때마다 아픈 척한다고도 하시더라

translation.en: I, I was sick.
Okay, I wasn't sick.
You know I hate reading in front of the class, in front of anybody.
translation.ko: 애들 앞에서 책을 읽는 게 싫어요 다른 사람 앞에서는요

translation.en: I get so nervous, and all the words get even more mixed up.
translation.ko: 너무 긴장해서 더 헷갈리는 것 같아요

translation.en: I know it's not easy, honey. And-- [inhales]
You know, it'll never be easy. But if you keep trying, I promise you, you will get better.
translation.ko: 앞으로도 어렵겠지만 계속 노력하면 나아질 거야

translation.en: -Okay. I promise I won't stop trying. -Aha! That's the spirit.
That's how you learned to ride, remember?
translation.ko: 어릴 때 말 타는 법도 그렇게 배웠잖아, 기억나?

translation.en: You'd fall off your horse, your horse wouldn't take commands.
translation.ko: 말에서 자꾸 떨어지고 말을 잘 다루지도 못했는데

translation.en: But you just never quit trying.
And, now, you're an amazing rider.
translation.ko: 그래서... 말을 엄청 잘 타게 됐네

translation.en: I promise I'll do better in school.
And I'll do all my homework.
I just think that Puzzle is special.
And I know I can help him.
I'm sure you can, honey. You help all the animals around here.
translation.ko: 그래, 물론이지 다른 동물도 다 돕고 있잖아

translation.en: -You really have a gift. -Thanks, Mum.
I do not know what we would do without you here. And Olivia. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 너 없이는 못 할 거야 올리비아랑 다른 봉사자들도

translation.en: And all the volunteers.
Thank goodness we have a vet in the family.
I've been retired for two years now. Apparently your mum did not get the memo.
translation.ko: 은퇴한 지 2년이 됐는데 네 엄마는 아직 모르나 봐

translation.en: Hey, fundraising has been a little tight lately, that's all.
At the moment, the only income we have is from boarding the horses like Apollo.
translation.ko: 요즘은 아폴로처럼 승마 체험으로 버는 돈이 다야

translation.en: Your mum's right. If we wanna keep Rescue Ranch going,
translation.ko: 엄마 말이 맞다 우리 목장을 계속 운영하려면

translation.en: we've gotta work on finding homes for all the animals.
translation.ko: 우리 목장을 계속 운영하려면 동물들한테 새 가족을 찾아 줘야 해

translation.en: And about Puzzle...
I know. Don't get too attached.
translation.ko: - 퍼즐도 - 알아요 - 너무 정들면 안 되죠 - 가능하면, 알겠지?

translation.en: If you can help it, okay?
translation.ko: - 너무 정들면 안 되죠 - 가능하면, 알겠지?

translation.en: After supper, I can help you with your homework, Skye.
Thanks, Olivia.
Only for an hour, okay? Then Grandpa will drive Olivia home.
Okay, Skye. Let's show your mum we can do this.
translation.ko: 스카이 - 아줌마한테 제대로 보여 주자 - 그래

translation.en: Yeah. And I can do my homework outside, too.
translation.ko: - 아줌마한테 제대로 보여 주자 - 그래 밖에서 숙제할 수 있다는 것도

translation.en: "...was a very cold one.
And one night..."
Act like you're presenting.
-♪ Way up in the sky ♪ -"And one night..."
Let's go. [exhales]
Easy, easy.
-Easy. Yeah, that's it. -[snorts]
[Olivia] She's gonna do it.
-She's getting on. -That's my girl.
-[whinnies] -Easy, Puzzle.
-[Puzzle whinnies, snorts] -It's okay. It's okay.
-[Olivia] Yay! -[shushing]
-Hi. -Hi.
-John? Hi, I'm Billy. -Yes. Nice to meet you.
This is the ranch, and that's where the horses are. Yeah, so...
-[Billy] We got a deal? -[John] Yes.
-Great. Fun doing business with you. -Thank you.
Oh, honey, well done.
-Way to go, kid. -Thanks, Mum. Thanks, Grandpa.
I didn't think you'd be riding him for weeks.
translation.ko: 몇 주 만에 퍼즐을 타게 되다니

translation.en: [Skye] Yeah. He's really coming around.
-Who was that man you were talking to? -Oh, that was Mr. Simpson.
translation.ko: 아까 그 아저씨는 누구예요? 심프슨 씨인데 에벌리 목장을 사셨대

translation.en: -He bought the Everly Ranch. -Yep.
-What did he want? -He just came to check out the operation.
translation.ko: 왜 오셨대요? 목장 운영하는 것도 보고 손주한테 조랑말도 사 주실 거래

translation.en: He wants to buy a pony for his grandkids.
translation.ko: 목장 운영하는 것도 보고 손주한테 조랑말도 사 주실 거래

translation.en: And you said he could have Puzzle.
Skye, we haven't agreed on anything yet.
But... [inhales] ...this could be a good situation for Puzzle and for all of us.
translation.ko: 하지만 퍼즐이랑 우리한테 정말 좋은 일이 될지도 몰라

translation.en: Look, Skye, I know you love Puzzle, and...
I know you'd be a wonderful owner. Right? But this is a rescue ranch.
translation.ko: 좋은 주인이 될 거라는 것도 알지만 여기는 동물 보호소야

translation.en: We take in horses and ponies that need our help,
and we work with them, physically and emotionally, and we heal them.
We come to understand them.
Through that understanding, we find them a perfect home
where we know that their owner and that animal is very happy.
translation.ko: 주인도 동물도 모두 행복할 수 있게

translation.en: That's where our success comes, when we find that perfect match.
translation.ko: 그게 우리 일이야 말이랑 주인한테 잘 맞는 짝을 찾아주는 거

translation.en: That allows us room to bring in new animals that need our help.
translation.ko: 그래야 다른 동물을 또 도울 수 있는 거고

translation.en: If we keep our rescues, Skye, we fail,
translation.ko: 동물을 데리고 있으면 목장을 계속할 수 없어

translation.en: because we don't have the time or the energy to help new animals that need us.
translation.ko: 그 많은 동물을 다 돌볼 시간도 힘도 없잖아

translation.en: How could you?
[Billy] Skye.
Skye!
Let her be. She'll be fine. -[Olivia] Skye! -[sighs]
translation.ko: 지금은 그냥 두자 곧 괜찮아질 거야

translation.en: -[snorts] -[Olivia] You okay?
We've done everything we said we would.
You're helping me with reading, I'm doing all my homework.
translation.ko: 네가 책 읽는 것도 도와줬고 나는 숙제도 다 했는데

translation.en: -I haven't been sick for any tests. -I know.
translation.ko: 시험을 볼 때도 정말 열심히 했어 그래, 목장 일도 정말 열심히 했지

translation.en: And we're working as hard as ever on the ranch.
translation.ko: 그래, 목장 일도 정말 열심히 했지

translation.en: So why would she wanna give him to some stranger?
translation.ko: 왜 모르는 사람한테 퍼즐을 주려고 하지?

translation.en: I don't think she wants to.
Rescuing means finding new homes for animals, making new space for animals.
translation.ko: 동물한테 새 가족을 찾아주고 또 다른 동물을 도와야 하잖아

translation.en: It's way too expensive to keep them all.
translation.ko: 계속 데리고 있으면 돈이 너무 많이 들 거야

translation.en: We have to do something.
What more can we do? There are only two of us.
What do you mean, only two?
What do you mean "what do you mean"?
-I mean, I count you two-- -One, two.
[scoffs] Thank you, Ethan.
And I count us two.
Three, four.
-You mean, you wanna help? -[girl] Of course, Skye.
translation.ko: 너희도 돕고 싶다고? 당연하지, 우리도 동물이랑 목장을 좋아해

translation.en: We love the animals and the ranch as much as you guys do.
And we don't wanna see Puzzle go anywhere.
[girl] Yeah.
Skye, if we have four of us instead of just two of us,
translation.ko: - 맞아 - 스카이 이제 네 명이니까 전보다 두 배는 많아

translation.en: it's like twice as many people.
translation.ko: 이제 네 명이니까 전보다 두 배는 많아

translation.en: We can get twice as much accomplished.
translation.ko: 두 배로 더 일할 수 있겠어

translation.en: More than twice as much if we work together.
translation.ko: 힘을 합치면 더 할 수도 있을 거야

translation.en: -Exactly. -[Skye] Like you and me, Olivia.
You help me with reading, I help you with riding.
translation.ko: 너는 책 읽는 걸 도와주고 나는 말 타는 걸 도와주고

translation.en: -We all have our strengths. -Yeah.
You're really smart and funny.
And you're a great reader and writer.
translation.ko: 책도 잘 읽고 글도 잘 쓰고

translation.en: And you know stuff.
And stuff you don't know, you can research.
translation.ko: 올리비아가 모르는 건 같이 찾아보면 되니까

translation.en: -Yeah, I can do that. [chuckles] -[girl] Exactly.
translation.ko: 그래, 그 정도는 할 수 있어 맞아, 그리고 이선은 그림은 정말 잘 그려

translation.en: And Ethan is an unbelievable artist.
translation.ko: 맞아, 그리고 이선은 그림은 정말 잘 그려

translation.en: But he's so shy, he hardly ever talks.
translation.ko: 낯을 많이 가려서 말수는 별로 없지만

translation.en: [exhales] I talk, but...
[girl] I'm great with design and photography.
We could have our own KidFriend page, to raise awareness.
I'll ask my mum to set it up.
translation.ko: - 엄마한테 만들어달라고 할게 - 모금도 할 수 있어?

translation.en: -And do some fundraising? -[girl] Exactly.
translation.ko: - 엄마한테 만들어달라고 할게 - 모금도 할 수 있어? 당연하지

translation.en: -A fun KidFriend page for fundraising. -Yes.
-We'll be like a superheroes club. -Yeah.
Only we're not superheroes, we're just kids. But we can be a club.
translation.ko: 진짜는 아니고 그냥 애들이지만 어쨌든 클럽은 만들 수 있지

translation.en: the Ponysitters Club.
-Great idea. -Awesome.
We have more than just ponies, though. Dogs, cats, donkeys, and ducks.
translation.ko: 조랑말만 있는 건 아니긴 하지 개, 고양이, 당나귀, 오리

translation.en: And bunnies.
-See how we believe in caring? -We like Gary the Goat, too.
translation.ko: 정말 많이 돌보고 있네 염소 게리도 정말 좋아

translation.en: And Skye is the most empathetic person I know.
She always identifies with how others feel.
translation.ko: 다른 사람 기분을 항상 잘 알더라고

translation.en: And we're all very helpful every day.
Okay. The hard part is,
is gonna be convincing my mum this is all gonna work.
We have to do it soon if we wanna keep Puzzle.
translation.ko: 게다가 서둘러야 퍼즐을 데리고 있을 수 있어

translation.en: And, if we wanna rescue other horses.
Two words. Digital presentation.
Great idea, Trish.
Do you think we can pull that all together by tonight?
translation.ko: 그런데 오늘 저녁까지 다 준비할 수 있을까?

translation.en: Definitely. We'll pitch like executives.
Oh, and shoot videos of the horses.
Okay.
[Skye] Let's get to work.
That wraps up the digital finishing touches.
translation.ko: 이제 웹페이지도 다 된 것 같아

translation.en: And...
we're live on our KidFriend page.
[both] Celebratory dance.
-I hear you're doing a presentation. -Yes?
You might need higher quality photos for your presentation.
Thanks, Shelby. It's just...
this is about rescue animals, not show ponies.
translation.ko: 조랑말이 아니라 동물 보호소에 관한 거야

translation.en: No offence. They're really nice photos.
translation.ko: 기분 나빠하지 마 사진은 정말 잘 찍었네

translation.en: I just thought Apollo would be a good role model for those other ponies.
translation.ko: 아폴로는 다른 조랑말에게 좋은 모범이라 사진을 준 거야

translation.en: Is this what non-horse owners do to waste their time?
translation.ko: 말이 없는 애들은 그러고 노나 봐?

translation.en: Who needs the Ponysitters Club when you can be in the Ponyowner's club?
translation.ko: 조랑말 돌보는 클럽 말고 조랑말 주인 클럽이 낫지!

translation.en: -[nickering] -[Shelby] Apollo.
There you are. Are you okay?
I was so worried with you being here with that new horse.
translation.ko: 말이 새로 와서 걱정을 많이 했어

translation.en: A well-bred horse like you shouldn't be near a creature like that.
translation.ko: 너는 종자가 좋으니까 저런 애랑 같이 있으면 안 돼

translation.en: -[whinnies] -Don't worry. I'll fix it for you.
You're not a boarder, so you don't deserve a stall.
You need to live in the back paddock, where you belong.
So this is our brand new web page.
We set up a link for donations.
We wanted to talk about selling yearly sponsorships to the ranch
and do monthly family tours.
translation.ko: 매달 가족끼리 놀러 올 수도 있어요

translation.en: -[Billy] My goodness! -Good idea.
So, to wrap it all up, I'd like to re-introduce the members of the club.
Olivia. Academic extraordinaire, literacy tutor,
translation.ko: 올리비아는 지식 담당이에요 독서 선생님이자 수석 작가고 조사원이죠

translation.en: and head writer and researcher.
-[both chuckle] -Trish.
Media expert, a designer with real flair, social convener,
translation.ko: 트리시는 미디어 담당인데 SNS 책임자고 재능이 뛰어난 디자이너예요

translation.en: -and somebody who likes to talk a lot. -[both chuckle]
Ethan, an incredible artist. A sensitive type that doesn't say much.
translation.ko: 이선은 훌륭한 화가인데 낯을 가려서 말수는 적어요

translation.en: I talk.
And, finally, me. Animal expert, I'm told.
Riding tutor. And, apparently, the president of the Ponysitters Club.
translation.ko: 승마 선생님이고 포니시터 클럽의 회장이 됐어요

translation.en: I didn't ask for it.
So, members...
Ponysitters Club.
-We stand up for... -[chuckles]
-[Skye] Caring. -Kindness.
-Empathy. -And helping.
-[in unison] Yeah! -Wow.
-Oh, my God. -Well done.
-[horse neighing in the distance] -What was that?
Oh, no. Puzzle.
What is Puzzle doing in the back paddock?
I don't know. He was supposed to be in a stall for rehabilitation.
translation.ko: 그러게 좀 쉬라고 마구간에 넣어 놨는데

translation.en: Um, Olivia, grab his tether. Uh, Trish, his blanket.
translation.ko: 올리비아는 밧줄을 갖다 주고 트리시는 담요 이선은 건초랑 사과를 갖다 줘

translation.en: -Ethan, some hay, apples to tempt him. -Good idea.
translation.ko: 트리시는 담요 이선은 건초랑 사과를 갖다 줘 그렇지

translation.en: -[Puzzle neighs] -Whoa. Let her go. She's got this.
[Grandpa] She's gonna do just fine. She's had the most contact with him.
translation.ko: 잘 해낼 거야 퍼즐이랑 가장 친하잖아

translation.en: -It's okay. You're safe. -[nickers]
I'm so relieved Puzzle's back in his stall.
So, that was the Ponysitters' first official activity.
-What do you say, Mum? -I think the presentation was impressive.
Thanks, Grandpa.
Skye, all of you... [hisses]
What can I say? Yes. [chuckles]
Oh, wait. Don't go anywhere.
We are not quite finished yet.
We are going to end off the presentation with...
a little reading.
I wanted to read the end of Doctor Dolittle
that I've been practising for school.
"And so it was, with all the odd other animals that were brought to him.
translation.ko: 그래서 다양한 동물이 둘리틀 박사에게 왔고

translation.en: As soon as they found that he could talk their language, they talked.
translation.ko: 그가 동물의 말을 하자 동물들은 얼마나 아픈지 어떤 기분인지 말했어요

translation.en: Told him where the pain was and how they felt,
translation.ko: 동물들은 얼마나 아픈지 어떤 기분인지 말했어요

translation.en: and, of course, it was easy for him to cure them."
translation.ko: 그래서 둘리틀 박사는 수월하게 동물을 치료했죠

translation.en: Good job.
I'm so proud of you. [chuckles]
Thanks, Mum.
-[chuckles] -Me, too. [Billy] Come on in. Everybody.
translation.ko: - 나도 안아 보자 - 다들 이리 와

translation.en: -Hmm. -Ponysitters! -[all] Ponysitters! -Yeah!
